values: The Gospel-Shaped Heart: Treasuring the Glories of ChristThe Gospel-Shaped Heart: Treasuring the Glories of Christ

The ultimate goal of the gospel is that God would be glorified in our enjoyment of him. God’s glory and our satisfaction are not two different ends, they’re one.The ultimate goal of the gospel is that God would be glorified in our enjoyment of him. God’s glory and our satisfaction are not two different ends, they’re one.
